contents.text: Rubber Trees spawn on the highest grass block

Every rubbertree Log has a 1 in 8 chance to increase its rubber level each time it is random ticked. In addition, there must be rubber leaves within 4 blocks, including diagonals. (This happens on averge every 9.1 minutes)
You can place a Rubber Tap on the side of a rubber log. You can click with any fluid handler (e.g. a bucket) on the Rubber Tap, your fluid handler will gain 500mb of rubber latex per rubber level.
